00056 /** \class  CompareIsotopes
00057 *  Comparator class used by Binary Search of isotopes collection based on atom number and mass number.
00058 */
00059 ref class CompareIsotopes: public IComparer
00060 {
00061 private:
00062 
00063         // Calls CaseInsensitiveComparer.Compare with the parameters reversed.
00064         virtual int Compare( Object^ x, Object^ y ) sealed = IComparer::Compare
00065         {
00066                 //When the atom number is the same, compare the mass number 
00067                 if (((Isotope^)x)->AtomNumber==((Isotope^)y)->AtomNumber)
00068                 {
00069                         if (((Isotope^)x)->Mass==((Isotope^)y)->Mass || ((Isotope^)y)->Mass==0)  return 0;
00070                         else if (((Isotope^)x)->Mass<((Isotope^)y)->Mass)  return -1;
00071                         else if (((Isotope^)x)->Mass>((Isotope^)y)->Mass)  return 1;
00072                 }
00073                 else if (((Isotope^)x)->AtomNumber<((Isotope^)y)->AtomNumber) return -1;
00074                 else if (((Isotope^)x)->AtomNumber>((Isotope^)y)->AtomNumber) return 1;
00075 
00076                 return 0; //For avoiding warnings
00077         }
00078 };
00079 
00080 /** \class  CompareIsotopesMass
00081 *  Comparator class used by Binary Search of isotopes collection based on mass number.
00082 */
00083 ref class CompareIsotopesMass: public IComparer
00084 {
00085 private:
00086 
00087         // Calls CaseInsensitiveComparer.Compare with the parameters reversed.
00088         virtual int Compare( Object^ x, Object^ y ) sealed = IComparer::Compare
00089         {
00090                 if (((Isotope^)x)->Mass==((Isotope^)y)->Mass)  return 0;
00091                 else if (((Isotope^)x)->Mass<((Isotope^)y)->Mass)  return -1;
00092                 else if (((Isotope^)x)->Mass>((Isotope^)y)->Mass)  return 1;
00093 
00094                 return 0; //For avoiding warnings
00095         }
00096 };
